# MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Media Player ](/documentation/mediaplayer)

- [ MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey ](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey)

-  MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey 

Global Variable# MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey

iOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatediPadOS 3.2–9.0DeprecatedMac Catalyst 13.1–13.1DeprecatedtvOSDeprecated

```
let MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey: String
```

Deprecated

Use AVPlayerViewController in AVKit

## [Discussion](/documentation/MediaPlayer/MPMoviePlayerThumbnailTimeKey#Discussion)

The value of this key is a [`NSNumber`](/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber) object containing a double value. This value represents the actual time (measured in seconds) from the beginning of the movie at which the image was captured.
